description: Originally started and organized by Filecoin foundation, SPWGs have been established to be communities for miners across the globe. This particular [branch](https://youtu.be/y4YZHRMmKpE?si=TUfObu4rPeR63bbF&t=1794) of [SPWG](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1K-6V7RXofRxWC3xpRw49beamseJjIQ9CrbA82UPV-8E/edit) (see media announcement [here](https://filecoinfoundation.medium.com/supporting-the-community-the-filecoin-mining-working-group-4bd5f289cbea), twitter [here](https://twitter.com/FilFoundation/status/1405206573606227974?s=20)) has been holding bi-weekly meetings and facilitating overall community communication & cross channel governance engagement since time roughly around Filecoin mainnet launch. In the past 6 months, working group has brought ecosystem participants into governance and group members have been actively participating in FIP discussions and governance as they did in the https://github.com/filecoin-project/FIPs/discussions/554#discussioncomment-5389118, bridging the missing links between core-devs / FF and SPs.
additional_impact: Asia SPWG has been contributing to Filecoin ecosystem since the very beginning and through bulls and bears. We believe that our project has not only had great impact on governance but also education and outreach category too.
end_user: Storage providers, prospective storage providers, miners, Filecoin Foundation, Filecoin Ecosystem as a whole all benefits from the project.
testimonials:
1. Praises from members: https://github.com/filecoin-project/community/discussions/744#discussioncomment-14493415
2. Acknowledgement from FF: https://fil.org/blog/filecoin-foundation-quarterly-update-april-2025, https://github.com/filecoin-project/FIPs/discussions/1105#discussioncomment-12408419

6. Praises from community: https://filecoinproject.slack.com/archives/CR98WERRN/p1756361532889529
governance_accessibility_impact: Our project made governance more accessible to more members of the Filecoin ecosystem by facilitating governance discussion and engagements. For example, https://fil.org/blog/filecoin-foundation-quarterly-update-april-2025, https://github.com/filecoin-project/FIPs/discussions/1105#discussioncomment-12408419
